notice_section.title: Parent-Teacher Meeting
notice_section.content: There will be a Parent-Teacher meeting on 2024-02-15 at 11 AM. Please ensure your participation.

notice_section.title: Annual Sports Day
notice_section.content: Our Annual Sports Day is scheduled for 2024-03-10. All students are encouraged to participate in various sports events.

notice_section.title: Exam Schedule
notice_section.content: The upcoming semester exams will start on 2024-04-05. Make sure to prepare thoroughly.

notice_section.title: School Holiday
notice_section.content: The school will remain closed on 2024-05-01 due to a public holiday. Enjoy your day off!
